body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is David Howard. May I have your name, please?

Hi David, this is Donna Lee.

Thank you, Donna. How can I assist you today?

I'm actually frustrated. I’ve been looking at the pricing for piano lessons, and it seems confusing.

I’m sorry to hear that, Donna. Let's see how we can clarify this for you. May I know the level of lessons you are interested in? Beginner, intermediate, or advanced?

It's for intermediate lessons.

Got it. Our intermediate lessons are fifty dollars per session, but we do offer a discount if you book more than five sessions at once.

I see, but I was also quoted a different price last week.

I apologize for the confusion, Donna. Can you please provide me with the last four digits of your registered phone number so I can look into previous quotes for you?

It's two one two four.

Thank you. I'll check our records. Meanwhile, could you also tell me the email address associated with your account?

Sure, it's donnalee at example dot com.

Thanks, Donna. I'll correct any discrepancies regarding the pricing. I appreciate your patience.

Okay, I hope this gets resolved soon.

Absolutely, Donna. Thank you for your time, and feel free to reach out if you have any more questions. Have a great day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, David Howard from a random business discusses pricing with Donna Lee. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.

Absolutely, Donna. Thank you for your time, and feel free to reach out if you have any more questions. Have a great day!
